column4: Hi! I've installed Oneic recently. My problem is that after the restart it won't boot from HDD. My partition table is looks like this: http://paste2.org/p/1857863 - can someone tell me if it won't boot or will? (+ why not?)
*oneiric
what step does it fail at ?
I choose it in boot menu, then it returns, so it can't recognice the OS?!
it stops at what ?
how do you mean this?
It returns to what ?
it returns to the temporary boot device menu...
In that menu there is an option at the end, that says Boot from first hard drive..try that option.
I think it's because you still have the USB/CD still connected,
no I have disconnected it :) USB...
Then there cannot be any temporary boot device menu..
okay..
yes, it can because it doesn't find any bootable :| unfortunately
I've tried, it returns to the live CD(USB)'s menu... this partition table must have some problem, right?
Is this a server install? or a normal desktop one ?
because the desktop install doesnt normally screw up partitions
it is just a normal desktop to a laptop
yeah, you are right, I've never seen the same before
there is no grub.cfg in /boot/grub, and it writes, that this is read only... why?! May there any problems with BIOS settings?!
uhh. you dont have permissions to change anything beyond /home/<user> and
if you arent using sudo... that is.
I'm not beginner, I'm using sudo, also for mounting, and for `update-grub`
